Toothbrush Head Attachment: Create interchangeable toothbrush head attachments for different oral care needs, such as sensitive teeth, gum care, and whitening. This would allow users to choose the best option for their specific dental concerns.

Water Pressure Indicator: Add a water pressure indicator to the toothbrush handle, which would alert users when they are applying too much pressure while brushing. This feature could help prevent enamel damage and gum irritation.

Built-in Timer: Incorporate a built-in timer into the toothbrush handle to ensure users brush for the recommended two minutes. The timer could also have different intervals for different brushing techniques, such as gentle or intense brushing.
Automatic Cleaning: Develop an electric toothbrush that can automatically clean its own bristles, making it more hygienic and reducing the need for manual cleaning.
Travel Case: Design a compact, portable travel case for the toothbrush that includes a built-in charging station and UV sanitizer to keep the toothbrush clean while on the go.
